snippet: The hedge fund magnate is seeking two seats on the board of the medical products maker.
abstract: DealBook Online; Daniel S Loeb's Third Point hedge fund says it has acquired 7 percent stake in Baxter International and is seeking two board seats.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: The hedge fund magnate is seeking two seats on the board of the medical products maker.

headline.main: Daniel Loeb’s Third Point Takes a Big Stake in Baxter
